NK083('u)007:1: // pad+ma'i lam rim gyi lo rgyus bzhugs /
NK083('u)007:3: slob dpon pad+ma'i dgongs pa rdzogs pa chen po'i man ngag gnubs chen sangs rgyas ye shes nas brgyud /
NK083('u)007:4: zur sh+aakya 'byung la bka' babs pa'i khung ma rang du snang la /
NK083('u)007:5: gu ru'i gter chos rnams phar bzhag /bka' mar grags
NK083('u)007:6: pa'i snga 'gyur rang rkang la rdzogs chen gyi chos
NK083('u)007:7: skor phal cher / bi ma la dang /
NK083('u)007:8: bee ro tsa na las brgyud pa shas che zhing /
NK083('u)007:9: sangs rgyas gsang ba dang gnubs chen gyis bru sha nas blangs pa dang /
NK083('u)007:10: rgya nag ha shang bdun brgyud dang /
NK083('u)007:11: rgya gar gyi slob dpon bdun rgyud sogs mang gis /
NK083('u)007:12: slob dpon pad+ma nas brgyud pa'i rdzogs chen ni 'di kho nar mngon no //
NK083('u)007:13: 'di yan rje btsun ta ra n+aa tha'i gsung ngo //
NK083('u)007:14: der ma zad mnga' bdag nyang gis zab gter nas bzhes /
NK083('u)007:16: des gu ru chos dbang la gnang /
NK083('u)007:17: chos dbang rin po ches kyang zab gter nas bzhes pa ste /
NK083('u)007:18: gter kha gong 'og gi gdams pa zung 'brel zur sh+aaka 'byung phyi ma'i phyag tu babs pas /
NK083('u)007:19: bka' gter gyi gdams zab chu bo gnyis 'dres su gyur /
NK083('u)007:20: 'chad nyan gyis gtan la phabs pa'i bshad sgrub rgya cher dar /
NK083('u)007:21: de yang gzhung rdo rje'i tshig rkang ni yi ge
NK083('u)007:22: gsum ka'i dgongs nyams zab cing rgya che ba thams
NK083('u)007:23: cad gcig tu dril bar snang na'ang /
NK083('u)007:24: skabs 'dir mthar thug gi rdzogs rim snying por dril
NK083('u)007:25: ba'i gdams pa ngo sprod kyi lugs su gdab pa'o
